content.raw:
Link.sdf contains a small trivial error which make it impossible to set the link damping from a world file.

  <element name="damping" required="1">
    <element name="linear" type="double" default="0.01" required="1"/>
    <element name="angular" type="double" default="0.01" required="1"/>
  </element> <!-- End damping -->

Should be:

  <element name="damping" required="1">
    <attribute name="linear" type="double" default="0.01" required="1"/>
    <attribute name="angular" type="double" default="0.01" required="1"/>
  </element> <!-- End damping -->

The new file can be found in the attachment.

Regards,
Erik Stoltenborg
content.html:
Link.sdf contains a small trivial error which make it impossible to set the link damping from a world file.

<element name="damping" required="1"> <element name="linear" type="double" default="0.01" required="1"/> <element name="angular" type="double" default="0.01" required="1"/> </element> <!-- End damping -->

Should be:

<element name="damping" required="1"> <attribute name="linear" type="double" default="0.01" required="1"/> <attribute name="angular" type="double" default="0.01" required="1"/> </element> <!-- End damping -->

The new file can be found in the attachment.

Regards, Erik Stoltenborg
